topics.body:
*Southern Pacific 4449 traveling through Northern California on a steam excursion.*

This locomotive here is my absolute favorite locomotive of all time. I want to ride aboard this train one day during one of its future excursions _at least once_ before I die.!http://www.railpictures.net/images/d1/1/1/7/5117.1153069200.jpg!

Also, this locomotive is pretty famous worldwide. It's considered one of the most famous there is. It's even famous for being the American Freedom Train, back in the 1970s during the USA's Bicentennial.
!http://ogrforum.ogaugerr.com/fileSendAction/fcType/0/fcOid/9173459911126392/filePointer/9173459912622714/fodoid/9173459912622709/imageType/LARGE/inlineImage/true/1976-10-29%2520Raleigh%2520NC%2520VIDEO.jpg!
